data.name: Dark Rose Valkyrie: PV Serial Display Campaign Item Set / PV連続公開キャンペーンアイテムセット / PV連續公開活動道具禮包
data.detailed_description:
Add special items with the PV Serial Display Campaign Item Set.

The following items will be added:
・Energy Pill DX x 5 ・Energy Pill EX x 3
・Energy Pack EX x 5 ・Energy Pack Max x 3
・Deepas Medicine EX x 5 ・Deepas Medicine Max x 3
・Deepas Pack EX x 5 ・Deepas Pack Max x 3
・Remedine EX x 5 ・Remedine Max x 3
・Remedine Pack EX x 5 ・Remedine Pack Max x 3
・Portable Camoflauge Device x 5 ・Portable Analysis Device x 3
・Hard Upper x 5 ・Act Upper x 5
・Power Upper x 5 ・Aim Upper x 5
・Stamina Upper x 5 ・Memory Upper x 5
・Speed Upper x 5 ・Technical Upper x 5

・Superdimension Save Data
※A new lineup will be added within the Development Room's [Tailoring].

※Uninstalling DLC items may prevent users from loading save files made before the DLC item was uninstalled. To ensure that users can load all Dark Rose Valkyrie save files, we recommend that users do NOT uninstall DLC items.

data.short_description: Add special items with the PV Serial Display Campaign Item Set.

fullgame.name: Dark Rose Valkyrie / クロバラノワルキューレ / 黑玫瑰女武神

data.supported_languages:
English*, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 1GB VRAM or more and compatibility with Direct X 11.0 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960, ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290, or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible sound card
